description: Work, Play, Protect Go from typing to viewing with one simple motion. The durable construction and thoughtful design details protect your new 3rd generation iPad from damage and the soft interior lining is soft against the screen. Lightweight and ultra-thin, this case slips easily into any bag without adding bulk. Auto Wake Magnets: Hidden Auto Wake Magnets wake up your iPad simply by opening the cover. Type and View Modes: The tri-fold cover converts to a versatile stand with angles perfect for either typing or viewing. Protective Corners Snap in corners hold your new 3rd generation iPad securely in place and keep it safe from damage. With a minimalist design approach the protective corners quietly fade into the background. Strap Closure When you're not using your iPad, the secure strap closure keeps the cover closed and your screen protected.
title: Belkin Pro Tri-Fold Folio Case / Cover with Stand for the New Apple iPad with Retina Display (4th Generation) & iPad 3 (Red)
